=====
Units
=====

PyNN does not at present support explicit specification of the units of
physical quantities (parameters and initial values). Instead, the following
convention is used:

================= =====
Physical quantity Units
================= =====
time              ms
voltage           mV
current           nA
conductance       ÂµS
capacitance       nF
firing rate       /s
phase/angle       deg
================= =====
